name: 6X6 Monster Truck Mayhem
description: This is an unforgiving competition where only the strongest and the most skilled survive.This is the arena where you drive 6X6 Monster Truck , crashing into the others and destroying their Monster Trucks, before they get the chance to destroy yours. Pick up power ups that will help you, buy upgrades and repair your monster truck  between levels and try to complete them all, so you can be the last one standing.
